name: Tales of The Realm
description:
Short RPG. READ ALL DIALOGUE. Even that MADE WITH GAMEMAKER LITE comes into the story. ;D Go to the Ruins of Time. They are the only place that has an ending. Thanks for playing!

CONTROLS:

Arrows: Move.

Z: Advance in some situations.

Mouse: Click buttons.

Space: Exit dialogue box.

Touching objects: Interact.
